rds (think it as a foreigner learning English and saying "car" when they me=
an "star". They sound similar, but have very different meanings).

 understand the words they said? It's fairly easy to get them wrong, especi=
ally in instances where you aren't the first person to listen to the record=

ll in the blank)". Our brains are going to tell us (fill in the blank) simp=

them clear enough to be agreed upon by a number of people who don't know wh=
at conclusions the other listeners have drawn.
